title: Augusta County: Daniel K. Schreckhise to James M. Schreckhise, October 17, 1864
summary: Schreckhise writes about the Union raids in the Valley and the difficulties the population is experiencing as a result. Schreckhise also shares other news from home with his brother.
keywords: African Americans, Agriculture, Battle Description, Family, Home Front, Slavery, Troop Movement, Women, American Civil War
